attributes.title: Very disappointed
attributes.review: Very disappointed. The app is very buggy and unusable. I was very angry when I saw the opening page. When I saw the page with night mode on, the page was bursting with shiny lights and colors which was offending considering my family has a history with seizures

attributes.title: Worst app ever created ❤️
attributes.review: After a few hours being on the app, a man came to my house, a senior to be specific. He was eat a burger. He spit out the pieces of burger that was chewed up and put it in my hand. He said, "Don't be disgusted, I only do this five hours a day. Trump 2020. Vote for him." And he left. That was the most disgustingness thing that ever happened.🤮👁👄👁

attributes.title: No NOn
attributes.review: I trued to order mcdonalds but for some reason it said “:((;):(:():);)));)” and i felt really violated after that it really hurt my feelings and i opened the app and i saw an orange which didnt make any sense because how is an orange our president but then i saw his small peen too and i was like wow chicken nuggets do exist also i tried to walk my fish by eating an equation yes or no

attributes.title: Worst App Ever!!
attributes.review: it’s so bad .. i don’t think it needs an explanation!! i saw the other reviews but i thought that they were false because sometimes people are dramatic. Everything they said was true.. i could not believe it. it was so horrifying and disturbing that i don’t ever want to open the app again!!

attributes.title: DO NOT INSTALL!!
attributes.review: Horrible! And I mean HORRIBLE!! The graphics on the video game is TRASH! At first I saw an orange waving, but it was drawing so badly, they tried to fix it by giving it hair, but it just looked so fake!!! The suit wasn’t any help either! As I got into the game, I noticed it was trying to brainwash me into voting this orange for president????? Super unrealistic! If I could give it 0 stars, I would.

attributes.title: Supporter of familyshare
attributes.review: I don’t like how this is supported by family share this politics are not a family matter it should be private. Also mission statement unclear it says make America great but doesn’t explain how and when. Would not recommend 😩 not user friendly why is my number needed

attributes.title: WORST APP CREATED
attributes.review: This app left a terrible glitch on my phone. It’s got all kinds of bugs and glitches and not to mention the traumatizing image when I first open the app... extremely unbearable to even look at the Cheeto. Definitely would rate 0 stars if I could. I will absolutely be having nightmares tonight too.

attributes.title: What is this
attributes.review: I am appalled by the disgusting graphics and images of this Cheeto. Who votes for this dusty man to be president? The navigation is awful and i do not like it. Uninstalled immediately cause “all apps matter”. Do a better job at the user interface and then I’ll probably give you another star for trying.

attributes.title: no❤️
attributes.review: my name is arr thritis and i’m 420 years old. i love big orange man and i want to support big orange 🍊 man so i got this app. but i regret that decision because as soon as i opened it my llama got abducted by a turtle that had a trump flag, my sheep was taken by a ufo that had a giant orange on it and my shark started to fly and was yelling “kill big orange man😹🗿👁👄👁” and worst of all, i was sent an email that showed big orange man naked, i still can’t get rid of him and his 🦐 out of my head. i am terrified and i know  that this app has caused it so please do not download this app unless you want to see the big orange man nude🤪🧚🏼‍♀️✨

attributes.title: no 😘😩💕✨
attributes.review: please don’t download this app, as soon as i did, it requested for my location and wouldn’t let me click no. since i couldn’t do anything else i let it have my location and hours later my whole family was assassinated. not too mention everything in my house was confiscated as now being property of trump. once in complained about my family being dead and all of my stuff being gone, i was given a slap to the face and a bag of half eaten cheese puffs and an empty bottle of coke as “compensation”. this app is the worst, don’t get it!
